segments.text: I look at the cookie jar, so innocent yet the center of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s excitement makes my heart swell a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the sight of the woman’s misplaced focus is troubling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Isn’t she the adult? Shouldn’t she be keeping an eye on them?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle has a life of its own, creeping dangerously toward the feet of the oblivious woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how this scene will play out, knowing something’s bound to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast of the tidy garden outside emphasizes the turmoil inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
